title: Matchmaking is horse shit
body:
Ranking are cow shit.

I just played a game of normals, enemy AD, Platinum IV. Next best on our team was Gold V (0LP), than a Silver 1 on enemy team on their 5th promo game, so basically both the same rank.

The so called Platinum player, sucked ass, completely. I at least thought we would have a fight on our hands, but no. I kicked Wukong out of the top lane, beat him so hard he actually left before 10 minutes and didn't come back, both Bronze 1.

I know this was a normal game, but if the ranks have anything to do with anything in this game, than the enemy team should have won easy.

replies.body:
Ranked MMR has nothing to do with Normal games.

If the plat player didn't play to plat standards they likely are having a bad day/match or bought the account/rank.

Yeh but a platinum getting smashed by a bronze? Like not even close to being a platinum player. I have seen better bronze players by a mile than this guy.

If he brought the account, he is a moron.
